entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #76410
  • Allow for atomic appends to end of file:: Round 2 #76408
  • [API Proposal]: Matrix and Vector types using generic math #76406
  • Tar: ExtendedAttributes does not synchronize with public properties of PaxTarEntry #76405
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Lazy api #76403
  • Tiered JIT: redundant compilations #76402
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Recording from the stream #76399
  • Idea for reducing enum parsing/formatting overheads #76398
  • FileSystemWatcher doesn't work with CIFS on Linux #76397
  • JIT arm32: Assertion failed 'refPosition->RegOptional()' in 'System.Numerics.Tests.ComplexTests:Abs(double,double)' during 'LSRA build intervals' when using non-standard arg sort #76382
  • [API Proposal]: Add IList<T> extension methods providing in-place update operations #76375
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Evaluate use/benefits of compact unwinding on osx-x64 and osx-arm64 #76371
  • [API Proposal]: Add compat source generator for System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator to .net Framework #76369
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 9/27/2022 12:44:07 AM #76390
  • [API Proposal]: synchronous API for creating a Quic listener #76360
    8.0.0
  • App hangs on macOS / Apple Silicon when run under Rosetta #76356
  • Generic method constrained by struct & interface can not see readonly modifier #76355
  • Not optimal code gen for IndexOfAny #76354
  • incorrect kind of datetime data #76353
  • FileCheck error: '__jit_disasm.out' is empty. #76352
    8.0.0
  • Memory leak in COM interop (IDispatch↔IReflect) #76350
  • Failures in checked/release asm diffs #76347
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'h->bbFallsThrough()' #76346
    8.0.0
  • Runtime_34937 and Runtime_33972 JITMinOpts test failures #76344
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Regressions from JitConsumeProfileForCasts #71068
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT descriptor file doesnt generate warnings #73952
    8.0.0
  • JIT does not eliminate null check for "o ??= new()" #75987
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!IsSSEOrAVXInstruction(ins)' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86.Program:ExtractInt32129()' during 'Generate code' #76343
    8.0.0
  • AES cryptographic library working ok in .NET 4.7.2 gives the following error in .NET 6 when decrypting existing data: System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException: Padding is invalid and cannot be removed. #76389
  • SPMI should avoid DASM roundtrip for analysis #76178
    8.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][LSRA] Restructure LinearScan::isAssigned to improve efficiency #8758
    Future
  • why there is lot differences in download speed between framework and dotnet #75203
    8.0.0
  • Strange IPAddress.Parse result with extra zero #76368
    8.0.0
  • Tagging subscribers to this area: @dotnet/area-system-console #76374
  • DSACertificateExtensions is not supported on iOS #76305
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector256\\Vector256_r\\Vector256_r.cmd #76280
    8.0.0
  • TypeEquivalence - value types with a `static` method shouldn't fail to load #73322
    Future
  • Runtime_34937 and Runtime_33972 JITBlue runtime test failures on the rolling build #76314
  • IdentityServer4, native build, missing meta exception #76380
  • [API Proposal]: Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.KeysCollection.Contains #75936
    8.0.0
  • Mixing open and closed service injections results in resolving unexpected services #76372
  • [API Proposal]: Add a DequeueEnqueue method to the PriorityQueue Type #75070
    8.0.0
  • Process will terminate when the async event throw any exception #76367
  • MemoryStream.Seek moves past the end of the stream #76351
  • ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback not called when client certificate used and server uses self sign certificate #75595
  • [wasm][debugger] Are derived static members returned in `getProperties` request correctly? #72856
    8.0.0
  • On a Mac, dotnet app results in CoreCLR error or FileNotFound exception if parent path folder names contain slashes #75882
  • Update experimental WebAssembly templates to use consistent string quotes in JS #75771
    7.0.x
  • [mono][runtime-extra-platform] Ran out of trampolines of type 1 #76245
  • API for inserting a Span<T> into a List<T> efficiently #1530
    8.0.0
  • Refactor Code for Contains.cs file #76348
  • Refactor Code for AnyAll.cs file #76342
  • ILCompiler no longer works with paths containing spaces #76248

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Disable gen 1 budget accounting fix for segments #76412
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix SuperPMI unit test error checking #76411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: increase slop tolerance when computing edge weights #76409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76407
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Tar: Use indexer setter instead of Add on ExtendedAttributes dictionary #76404
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix edit and continue in VS with hardware exceptions #76401
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Update memory load information after world is resumed #76400
    area-GC-mono
  • [PERF] Pass local runtime timestamp from git into ci_setup #76396
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add DiagnosticSource.Write<T> API to assist with trimming #76395
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • remove LangVersion workarounds #76394
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76393
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76392
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix distribute free regions #76391
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove some dead code from Array.IndexOf #76388
    area-System.Runtime
  • [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76387
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • NativeAOT: Conversion for opcode conv_u4 is unsigned #76386
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SuperPMI collections: exclude more files/directories #76384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #76383
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests improvements #76381
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • 73150 enable CborDocument_Roundtrip test #76378
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76370
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Remove unnecessary encoding allocations in System.Private.DataContractSerialization #76366
    area-Serialization
  • Remove encoding allocations for System.Security.Xml #76364
    area-System.Security
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Improve early bail-out logic in GCInfoDecoder #76359
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Disable gen 1 budget accounting fix for segments #76365
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Templates nits #76373
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76324
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Generate single interface dispatch map per canonical form #76362
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix using DependencyGraphViewer with AOT compilers #76357
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [tests] Disable source generator tests mobile #75609
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce Enum.GetEnumName overheads #76162
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • JIT: optimize redundant branches by looking through phis #76283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that StoreInd for contained HWIntrinsics has the constant "fit in byte" #76385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Improve speed significantly for large diffs #76238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back ReadOnlySpan in QuicStream #76088
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Remove some extra static arrays used in Split() #76003
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Return s_defaultResultTask from Task.FromResult in more cases #76349
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix distribute free regions #74916
    area-GC-coreclr
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Delete malformed package.json used for tests, it confuses Component Governance tooling #76309
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] WasmAppHost: Fix crash when starting wasmbrowser project #76236
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Updating owners #76330
    area-Meta
  • Issue #75070 - Add PriorityQueue DequeueEnqueue Method #75993
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix value type with static method fails to load #76262
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make KeysCollection.Contains methods public. #76319
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Templates nits #76182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Reduce allocations around empty ReadOnlyCollections #76097
    area-System.Collections
  • [wasm] Update templates to work for multiple versions #76124
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests for static inherited members. #75512
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix missing defined and SIMD checks in Sqrt, Floor, Ceiling intrinsics #76177
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] new unit test for duplicate call to ImportAsync #76179
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Implement eager finalization of WeakReference #76173
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix not to create unnecessary `thread_params` #76007
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding a debug only config knob for testing loop unrolling limits #76288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Add List<T> AddRange, InsertRange, and CopyTo extensions for spans #76274
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Dispose key when importing X.509 PEM #76329
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] Fix #76260 Add nullable annotation to INumberBase<>.TryParse #76304
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] fix div by zero in gen size calculation #76334
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Gradual decommit in wks #76306
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add custom ResponseFile handler #76271
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/6.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76327
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Align parameter default value resolution between coreCLR, Mono and NativeAOT runtimes #75612
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Remove GT_ADDEX and replace with more generalized containment handling #76273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Support running Reflection tests within Visual Studio #75915
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] add missing API xml doc #76196
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] For beforefieldinit classes, only field accesses trigger … #76335
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Distributed transaction fixes #76310
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Updating Vector256 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector128<T> ops #76221
    area-System.Numerics
  • global.json: Bump sdk to 7.0.100-rtm.22476.1 to pick up a msbuild fix #76220
    NO-MERGE
  • Add overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync #75989
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Bug] Fix issue #70227 #76143
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add the ability to start and stop IHostedService instances concurrently #75894
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Dot intrinsics for Amd64 #76239
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Discount committed when checking for sufficient space #76217
    area-GC-coreclr
  • update arm32 test queues for msquic #76267
    arch-arm32, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Bump the runtime net6 versions for GA #76270
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Ensure end_gen0_region_space is always computed #76214
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add support for GT_STORE_BLK #2005
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add void to .c functions that have no parameters - something about K&R functions?? #2004
  • Initial green thread prototype #2002

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: stelem always use unsigned cast #2003
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: extern globals should not be constant #2001

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: cast unsigned ints to floats using uitofp #1994

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Applicationurl shouldn't randomly generate port 5060 or 5061 #28265
  • dotnet new --install should have more information than "No templates were found in the package" #28261
  • When using X509KeyStorageFlags.EphemeralKeySet, AllowPlaintextExport is missing in Export policy, and we will Exception when invoke ExportPkcs8PrivateKey #28245

Closed

  • "dotnet build" fails on non-Windows for projects that multi-target where Desktop is one of the targets frameworks. #826
    Backlog
  • Custom satellite resource assembly not output when using .NET 7 RC1 #27890
  • Most dotnet commands fail with WorkloadManifestCompositionException after installing VSPreview #24854

PullRequests

Created

  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch

Merged

  • Increase cache assets file format version to 11 in 7.0.1xx #28222
    Servicing-approved, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Fix msbuild evaluation of ApiCompat task pkg #28262
  • don't emit "attribute added" diagnostic when not in strict mode #28243
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert pr28057 #28212
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2007653 #27667
  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type (#27648)" #28233
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28238
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    area: common templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Track subtype exhaustiveness for classes with only private constructors #4032
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420

PullRequests

Updated

  • Spec out as return only #6483

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suggestion to prefix with "this" doesn't shown when setting delegate prop #64374
  • Non-exhaustive switch expression w/ tuple deconstruction causes csc.exe to fail with exit code -2146232797 #64370
  • EditorConfig Allow multiple blank lines doesnt work. #64369
  • Breaking change for methods with multiple refs #64365
    17.4

Closed

  • Improve Source Link navigation for simple async methods #64336
  • Erroneous CS8370 when using IntPtr comparison in C# 7.3 #64059
    17.5
  • StackOverflowException when compiling project with large (12MB) cs file and targeting net6.0 #64225
    17.4
  • CodeRefactoring API #64363

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump patch version to 1 for nuget. #64381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Set starting size for changed text builder using old text #64379
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - don't show in razor documents #64378
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - don't show in razor documents #64377
    Area-IDE
  • Wait until an analyzer is registered before streaming workspace events over to OOP #64376
    Area-IDE
  • Add non-strict search flag for legacy unit test providers #64375
    Area-IDE
  • Bridge existing unit testing analzyer to new system. #64371
    Area-IDE
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Listen to build manager events to know when build is complete #64366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for code refactorings in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Remove special case in PEModuleSymbol.UseUpdatedEscapeRules for module referencing System.Runtime 7.0 #64361
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64362
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64298
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64360
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Always bind implicit constructor initializers for explicit constructors #64331
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64042
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unneeded SolutionCrawler reasons that UnitTesting is not using. #64367
    Area-IDE
  • Out as return only #64318
    Area-Compilers, servicing-consider
  • Miscellaneous improvements to the ETW logging code #64359
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove feature flag #64350
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' into features/solutionEvents. #64372
    Area-IDE
  • Bitness specific test conditions #64373
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Produce a dedicated, index-based, api for unit testing to find the source location of test methods. #64351
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove LangVer check on using a native int operator #64325
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Change ForAttributeWithMetadataName to use an explicit stack when recursing #64322
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix the stack overflow in AbstractEmbeddedLanguageClassificationService.cs #64311
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64358
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64357
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64356
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64355
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64386
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64385
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64384
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64383
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2007778 #64310
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Make remaining managed pointer type scenarios warnings #64294
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.4
  • Capture UIntPtr binary operator resolution break #64353
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • [LSP] Add missing project context handler for ts #64284
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Inline Hints - Make sure hints aren't returned after code has been deleted #64341
    Area-IDE
  • Update SymbolDisplay API to include scoped for parameters and locals #64285
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid writing `CDATA` to generated targets file #64334
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DecodeForwardIteratorRecord to accept strings w/o null terminator #64349
    Area-Interactive
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Better handle methods in partial classes that don't have sequence points #64337
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor CSS Isolation Issue only on certain pages #44267
  • [Analyzer] Verify no two or more pages are using the same @page path #44266
  • [release/8.0] Update Roslyn Versions for Runtime Compilation Package #44265
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM Redirection after Authenticating #44264
  • Blazor Wasm ( Hosted )Template project issue with Authentication #44262
  • kestrel web api causes its client app failure of An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host #44261
  • Docs: Minimal APIs - Middleware + perf + configs #44259
    7.0.0
  • Docs - Minimal APIs - Dealing with responses #44258
    7.0.0
  • Docs - Minimal API - Document your APIs #44257
    7.0.0
  • Docs - Minimal API Basics #44256
    7.0.0
  • Typo in Title of ControllerBase.Problem() #44254
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove magic string for razor component @page routing #44253
  • [Analyzer] Verify Blazor route type constraints are specified with all lower-case letters #44252
    Backlog
  • Format arguments for IStringLocalizer do not support nullable reference types #44251
    Backlog
  • Best practice to use IResult in a class library #44250
  • Problem with slow loading of static files such as js in .NET 6.0.8 and IIS 10 web application #44255
  • [RequestHeaderTests] Unit tests always succeed #44249
    Test failures
